segments.text: Which bus should I take from PHS to Sons ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me which Sons you want to go to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe that it's on Fair Oaks and Orange Grove .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll have to catch two different buses to get there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know which buses I need to take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The 268 is the first bus you need to catch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do I do after I get on the 268 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Get off when you get to Fair Oaks and Washington .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Catch the 261 and get off at Sons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all you have to do .
segments.speaker: S2
